addon.name: NEC - PC Engine / CD (Beetle PCE FAST)

extension.summary: NEC - PC Engine / CD (Beetle PCE FAST) v0.9.38.7
NEC - PC Engine / CD (Beetle PCE FAST) v0.9.38.7
extension.description:
Beetle PCE Fast, a PC Engine emulator for Libretro, is a fork of Mednafen's PC Engine driver.
Supported files: .pce, .cue, .ccd, .chd
